Title: The New Industrialists | OpsMate AI and using generative & agentic AI to improve productivity
Author: Microsoft Cloud
Description:
Howard Heppelmann, CEO of Opsmate AI, discusses how his company uses generative and agentic AI to help manufacturers capture and institutionalize critical knowledge, automate non-value-added tasks, and improve productivity by rapidly solving bottleneck issues on the factory floor.

#Microsoft #MicrosoftCloud
